entry.title: Trouble Shooting
entry.content: Trouble Shooting Shadows 手游不支持软阴影 前向渲染仅支持一个方向光投影Some of my objects do not cast or receive shadows 只有不透明物体接受或者投射阴影 顶点 shader 不接受阴影，但是可以投射阴影 只有像素光照投射阴影

entry.title: Importing from the Asset Store
entry.content: Importing from the Asset Store Location of downloaded Asset files Mac ~/Library/Unity/Asset Store Win C:\Users\accountName\AppData\Roaming\Unity\Asset Store
